basics.label: Finance Manager
basics.summary: Outgoing Sales Manager offering superb customer service proficiency and passion for exceeding sales goals. Results-oriented professional specializing in the sale of Automobiles. Strong customer skills and the ability to handle task with accuracy and efficiency with a unique ability to relate to diverse clients and close high-dollar sales. Knowledgeable and innovative finance, sales and marketing professional whose success is based on integrity, exceptional customer service, efficiency, and ambition.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: As the Finance manager I submitted loan applications to banks to obtain financing for customers along with completing all the necessary bank and state documents necessary for the purchase of automobiles. My responsibilities also consisted of creating good customer relationships designed to grow future business.
highlights: Secured bank loans for the purchase of new and used automobiles.
Completion of all necessary bank and state documents for the purchase of automobiles
Sale of Warranty and maintenance products to customers

work.name: Company Name

courses: Dale Carnegie Sales and Management Training.
